name: Merge column(s) of several number arrays

controls.caption: Requires input
controls.name: requireInput
controls.description: If set, at least 1 input port must contain some initialized number array; in other case, this function will throw an exception. If this flag is cleared, all input ports may be empty: output port will still stay empty.

controls.caption: Resulting element type
controls.name: resultElementType
controls.description:
"Common type of all inputs" variant requires that all input ports must have identical element type.
"Type of the 1st input" leads to automatic cast of all inputs to the element types of 1st initialized input port.

controls.name: numberOfEmptyColumns1
controls.caption: Number of columns if no input_1
controls.description: If input_1 port is empty (not initialized or not connected), this function inserts this number of "empty" columns instead of it. "Empty" column means a column, filled by NaN for float/double element types or by 0 for integer types. By default, this value is 0, i.e. this input is just ignored. The further parameters "Number of columns if no input_X" have the same sense.
